git.tagAnnotation: ⚠️  REPUBLISHED: Tag moved to include urgent fixes for v${version}

before:init: echo '⚠️  WARNING: This will MOVE the existing tag v${version} to the current commit!'
echo '⚠️  This breaks semver immutability and should only be used in exceptional cases!'
hooks.after:release: echo '⚠️  IMPORTANT: Tag v${version} has been moved. Users may need to re-fetch tags.'
